website_summaries.verdict: An excellent everyday cooler at an affordable price.
pros: Affordable 24-can cooler that is sturdy and easy to clean
Comes in a wide range of colors
cons: Some felt the shoulder strap was on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but a few important flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: -Very nice looking. -Spacious. The perfect size (24 can) for a guy like me (6' tall, walks 15 minutes each way to work) that puts 3 each 16oz cold drinks in it, an small umbrella, and a good sized lunch and snacks for the day. -Has a detachable strap (which is important, read the cons). Cons: -Too expensive. -Strap is designed for very short distance walking, i.e. is only 3 feet long and has no shoulder cushion. Painful to use on day one. Had to spend another $9 to order a new strap via amazon that is much longer and has a shoulder strap. -Zippers are hard to use at times.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Esper

customer_reviews.title: Not same as pictured item
customer_reviews.text: The item we received is NOT the item pictured. We chose this one because of the front pocket and the one we received does not have a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Cdawg

customer_reviews.title: Pay close attention to details when buying things online people
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my food, water bottles, and blender bottles for my 12 hour shifts at work. Keeps things nice and cold for a while too although that's not a necessity for me. For those of you who are upset about not getting the front pocket you need to pay closer attention. The smaller lunch box (12 can model) does not have the front pocket and if you select the small model the picture does in fact show no front pocket. The larger lunch box (24 can model) has the front pocket. So no, there was no false advertising. I ordered the red/black 24 can lunch box and it has the front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: John Larson

customer_reviews.title: No front zipper pocket as advertised for my bag
customer_reviews.text: The advertised bag for the 12 can cooler shows a front exterior zipper pocket, which is exactly what I was looking for. I saw the same bag at a nearby store and found it cheaper on Amazon. But the item that was delivered did not include the front exterior zipper pocket. I like the bag and I love the Under Armour brand, but to falsely advertise a product makes me wonder if I should have just purchased the bag at a local sporting goods store instead. At least I would’ve known what I was paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to open
customer_reviews.text: The zippers they put on this cooler are horrible. To open the zippers you have to pull on a string. I can foresee the zippers tearing away from the cooler. And good luck opening it one handed. Also the cooler doesn’t keep ice packs frozen for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Durable, spacious and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: My husand loved this for his work lunches! The inside is a very sturdy plastic encasement attached to the soft outer shell. They are not able to separate, so you would need to wipe this down regularly to keep it clean (not machine washable). The fact that it is black and grey helps, but I would still give it a good wet wipe once per week. It has a strong silicone short handle as well as a shoulder strap. It's very different from the thermos cooler he was using prior to this, and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Legal Begal

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box/Cooler
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT for my high school son who does ROTC Raiders, weight lifting and is very active. It holds a lot and is very easy to send him with 2 or more drinks as well as a nice balanced lunch. It also fits in his locker so it's not too big. Quality is top notch, hard plastic inside, nice smooth zippers, cloth outside, rubber handle. I would def. purchase again. Plus the neon colors help him keep track of it :)
customer_reviews.author: keke

customer_reviews.title: You can hide your food in there
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome lunch pail I use it every say for my meals. You can fit an ice pack along with a couple Tupperware containers along with a shaker cup laid down fits snuggly keeping the cap on. The side pouches can fit up to 6 granola or protein bars depending on the size. With an ice pack it will stay cold all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Warehime

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my job I keep my water very cold during my 12-14hr shift. I was able to fit 14 bottles of water and set my lunch on top. Food stays cold, no leaks or sweating thru zipper so far. Bag stayed on my passenger seat of my tractor trailer thru rough road travel and never moved. I love it so far. Liner wipes out easily after each use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh have we gone thru coolers in my house and I mean high priced coolers too. This one by far is nicest, it is finally large enough for a grown man and has a really durable hard plastic shell interior, although it’s not removable, it is super easy to clean. It’s large enough for Tupperware, two or three bottles of water and still room for snacks. It also still looks like a lunch box and not something you look like you are carrying to feed a family of four on a beach day.
customer_reviews.author: Tammey

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for the dimensions. I needed a cooler with more internal space without any added height so I could continue to keep in the break cooler at work. I am giving it only 4 stars because because of zipper inconveniences: 1. The main zipper on top is too snug to the plastic interior making it difficult to unzip. t's not uncommon that I have to pull on several times to get the cooler open. 2. The loopy zipper pull themselves are all the same color and cross each other, therefore when the cooler is closed, sometimes I pull on the wrong one. Apart from the zipper irritations, overall I am very pleased with this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: robomacman

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad habit of buying my lunch while at work daily. That has been both costly, and bad for my health. So I decided to purchase this bad boy and i have been let down! It’s very well constructed and sturdy. The interior is a hard rubber/plastic material that is not removable but it’s easy to clean and doesn’t retain any odor. I use it daily and it has held up exceptionally well. I use one of those ice sheet packs and it keeps the food inside cold for several hours (pack lunch at 8 eat by 3pm) and it still stays cold. I’d definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: I like the size as it is perfect for pop and beer etc. I do not like the way it zippers and have not had it long enough to know if it is durable. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Zippers
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic lunch box except for... The zippers are AWFUL. The only way to make them work is to hold the close end and pull up and out on the zippers - otherwise, it is a real struggle to move them. This is such a bad issue I would steer clear of an otherwise great lunchbox - too bad UA did not test this or they would not have released it with such bad zippers
customer_reviews.author: Andy LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I thought, nice color combo... BUT
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, the larger size, the color combo and shoulder strap. However, the lining of the bag is very thin.... within the 2nd month of using it, I already noticed 2 small holes through the inside top/lid lining from containers that didn’t lay flat (is what I am guessing” and when it is full I am afraid to use the handle because it looks and feels flimsy (I fear it will rip away from the bag).
customer_reviews.author: Dana D.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews on similar products it gave me a migraine headache. A co-worked had this same cooler he carries everyday to work. To be a year old it still looked new, none of the defects I read in reviews. I purchased it so far it meets my expectations. I'll let you know this time next year its condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Clemmer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waist your money on this “cooler”!! It is a glorified nylon bag with absolutely NO insulation value. Sticking an Under Armor logo on the bag....well, Under Armor usually indicates a superior item, but not in this case.
customer_reviews.author: GunnerTM

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband’s lunch box for work. At first, the zipper seemed troublesome because it would catch on the bends. But after a little more use, it is as smooth as it could be and we have no problems. The cooler is big enough for my husband to take several Pyrex containers and 2 large bottles of water, plus extra snacks. Everything stays a nice temp. It is also small enough that it fits in the fridge in the break room.
customer_reviews.author: FitMommy3

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box For My husband!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this cooler, the camo color i chose is even nicer in person! i bought it for my husband to take his lunch to work in, the inside liner (made by “Thermos”) is amazing and the pockets on the side and front are so useful && its made very very well! Would Buy Again, cannot wait to see how it holds up over time, i think this one will finnally last more then six months for him!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Franko

customer_reviews.title: LASTED THREE YEARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the husband to take his lunches to work. He used it for THREE YEARS!! Mon-Fri and we also used it for weekend get aways. We definitely got our use out of it. The zipper finally failed, the teeth got bent out of shape. He loved it and has gottan soooo many compliments from his co-workers. Time to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are junk!
customer_reviews.text: A decent bag which otherwise I would rate highly but the zippers are pathetic and were inadequate from day one. I had read a couple reviews that others had posted concerning the poor zipper quality but I purchased it anyway. Found out immediately that I could only zip the bag shut from one direction or it would pull apart. One year later that no longer works either. Cannot carry it or pick it up from the handle or the bag contents will spill out when the zipper lets loose. I have to replace it now but it will be for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: lori a fain

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this lunch box, I had one before but the zipper broke after about a year. I bought another because to me the it was worth the money. one of the things I like most is the hard plastic liner inside. It makes it very easy to clean, and your food doesn't get smashed if somebody puts something on you lunch or pushes against it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are not as easy to unzip as I would like because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Its lighter weight than a normal plastic cooler. Zippers are not as easy to unzip as I would like because of the position of the zippers. It won't hold 12 craft beer sized cans only holds about 9 cans. The inside is hard plastic so you can't fit any more than that. May be okay for soda sized cans.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie D.

customer_reviews.title: Using Ice after putting drinks and food in it is a bad idea
customer_reviews.text: I Put drinks and snacks in ice chest, then put ice on top of drinks to keep them cold. I then put it in the car and as the ice melted, the water would slosh around in the ice chest and leak through the zippers on to the carpet. This was very disappointing, as I wanted this travel ice chest for the inside of the car, and I like using ice. It looks great, and the plastic ice chest liner is a good feature, to prevent it from leaking, but you can't put much ice in it after you put drinks in it. It would be functional if I used the synthetic ice packs only.
customer_reviews.author: VinnieD

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a christmas present. He works in EMS and needed something sturdy to take on the road with him to keep his lunches in. It seems easy to clean with the plastic inside, It is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Contents Spill Out
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving sturdiness 3 stars is because i don't like how the front zipper tapers halfway down the front of the cooler. This makes it so you cant really put as much in it as they say because either the contents or the ice will spill out when you open it. If you only fill it half way, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Seyfried

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cooler, with additional storage pockets on each side, and front. Several co- workers complimented on its appearance. I use it daily to pack my lunch for work with a couple of bottles of water and a ice pack
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Sweet lunchbox and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch box it's the perfect size to fit ice packs and water bottles and everything I need for lunches. Loved the design and very durable inside and out. And super easy to clean because it is a semi-hard liner. Wish it was insulated on the top piece.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Riley

customer_reviews.title: Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler because every year I have to replace my work cooler. I thought this one would last but the zipper broke after four months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware not well insulated
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied and disappointed, I thought that Under Armour was a better brand received item and put it to the test indoors. 12 pack and bag of ice did not last 5 hours. You pay a lot of money for a brand named item and to have it perform like a low end item. I will definitely be returning this item, and looking to purchase a Coleman or Titan. Wasted 2 10lbs bags of ice in less that 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: jesus perez

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars because i dont know how long does the stuff stays cold it seems flimsy but at that price point its good , i am only using it when am playing tennis which only last an hour to put water and cold pack, it seems to do the job for that short amount of time, ill update my review once i had a chance to use it more for longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: chicken choker

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox too!
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Bought as an Xmas gift for my hubby to use as a lunchbox. He loves it. Strudy - he overstuffs it and carries daily. Lasted 8 months now and still has life left
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra-in-Cali

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler!!! I used this cooker to put my niece’s milk while traveling to the Philippines and it fits perfectly underneath the sit on the plane. I didn’t have to stand to open the bin to get her milk. Very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: wintersolstice06

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Been had this bag a while and still like brand new. Great lunch bag for work and a great investment for a long term bag that wont tear or rip after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: GrimReaper

customer_reviews.title: Everyday use for outside work
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler, the description is 100% accurate. Plenty of pockets on the outside for whatever you may need to hold. Made with canvas so it holds up well to all conditions. The cooler is so worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can trust Under Armor
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback to this cooler is the front section which dips. Without the dip you could pack more ice without it falling out when opened
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Thaxton

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lunch box for my boyfriend, he drills water wells so he is always outside and out doing service work, this lunch box has been great so far, the built in hard plastic is great keeps the lunch box from getting floppy and super easy to clean out, has two side pockets that fit his protection glasses, recuse inhaler and headphones!! Over all this it a great lunch box for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design, it’s definitely a do not buy. Under Armour really dropped the ball on this one. The design is awful.. The cooler doesn’t hold 12 cans as advertised, only 8 (12 oz) cans maximum. Then after struggling with the zipper to get it open the ice falls out because of the poor design. Shame on Under Armour for putting their name on this awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 281

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide opening and durability of this bag. It is very spacious and has three separate zipper pockets to store essential items. I can place a styrofoam compartmental tray inside of the bag without any difficulty. The wide strap allows you to carry your bag at a comfortable level at your side. My food remains cool for a long period of time with my slim ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: FlaCrimeDawg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Under Armour product. Sturdy, spacious, and easy to clean. My husband uses it daily to carry his lunch. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on the left side of the bag is to low it hits on the plastic shell. Unfortunately I really didn't notice it under the zipper broke and I took a closer look to see why. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issues
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we purchased due to the first one the zipper broke. This one seems to have the same stiff and hard to pull zipper so I’m thinking it may have the same problem. Sucks because he loves it other than the zipper. It’s awesome to carry his lunch, meds etc because of the extra pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great for those hard workers!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husbands for his birthday, he loved it! It’s a great, durable lunchbox and can hold a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! Wish the top zipper was a little earlier to open or close but that is my only complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G. Seel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lunchbox, I get a ton of compliments on it. Easy to clean. Good amount of room in the pockets too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler we can hold alot and keeps our drinks super cold on hot days
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cooler for my husband for work. He's an in state truck driver and I like making him lunches for his long drives. I just wish it had separate compartments for hot and cold instead of the one large one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for one that my husband used 5 days a week for over a year. He can be quite rough on things and this held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sony7669

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Lightweight 12 pack Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works well at keeping my items cool. Nice and lightweight, handle seems sturdy. Zippers are a little hard to operate at times.
customer_reviews.author: bsboen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cooler for my lunch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunch box! Keeps my lunch cold and has plenty of room for meal and snacks .
customer_reviews.author: Tmac

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour 24 Can Soft Cooler, Graphite ...
customer_reviews.text: cooler was received in great condition but was actually too large for our needs...was 4" wider than described in the listing...returned for the smaller one similar to it...
customer_reviews.author: Dean Tecklenburg

customer_reviews.title: Don't fill up to the top.
customer_reviews.text: You can't have water in it, because the water spills out easily and you can not fill it up to the top because of front funny cut.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.I

customer_reviews.title: Awesome UA Cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this cooler daily for work. It's the perfect size for a "big man's lunch" with lots of extra drinks. As always, Under Armour has provided a durable product that will stand the test of daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out design.
customer_reviews.text: I liked best the good looks, the space inside and the oval lid. Smart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself and my wife liked the size so I ordered her one and she lives it. We use it for our daily work lunch
customer_reviews.author: Zenitram

customer_reviews.title: Annoying design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Love the cooler, works great, looks nice, but has an annoying design flaw. Zipper is pretty tricky at the top where it curves. I bought the 12 can size & the 24 can size & both have the same issue. You gotta jiggle it. It works, but it’s annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Under Amour Cooler I absolutely love how they keep my food & beverages cold, no leaking period. The zipper can be a little tough to open and close but otherwise amazing. It's my work lunch box & my weekend beverage cooler 😁
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to clean and looks awesome! My husband uses this for his work lunch. Highly recommend this lunchbox!
customer_reviews.author: MALeffler1220

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my husband and he loves it! It’s big and super durable. I recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction of zipper
customer_reviews.text: Lunch box is great, zipper not so much. After a few months the stitching gave holding the zipper to the lunch box. Then a few months later the zipper started to come apart. Needs high quality construction. I work in the construction industry so things can get beat up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Nice strong straps, and zippers. Super easy to clean the inside
customer_reviews.author: Brooke k nj

customer_reviews.title: Hard to zip
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great nose bag, but it's hard to zip
customer_reviews.author: Jason King

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, color, pockets, easy to clean but it is hard to zip open and close due to way it is designed.
customer_reviews.author: BEP

customer_reviews.title: Keep food cold
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are hard to use. Does not keep food cold
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Large and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I like the lunch box except for the zipper I feel that the routing of the zipper will failure prematurely which would not be great since the price is expensive
customer_reviews.author: joshua twiss

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but way over priced. You're basically paying for the logo. The strap is ridiculously short too.
customer_reviews.author: Brutal_NH

customer_reviews.title: Love these lunch boxes!
customer_reviews.text: Love under armor lunch boxes. I like how easy they are to clean with the hard surface on the inside. Inside doesn’t rip or tear either. Great for my son who is hard on everything. My son likes the size because we can put more food and drink in his lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Alwfocus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cooler! Holds everything I need for the day .
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Would recommend it to anyone looking for a good sturdy cooler or you can use it as a Lunch Box also. Either way you can't lose.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel E Macliz

customer_reviews.title: Troubled zippers
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooler the only thing is that the zippers are hard to move either way you have to use both hands to open it.
customer_reviews.author: travis fogle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size cooler
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is a police officer and asked for a cooler to keep his stuff cool in his patrol car. This was perfect! Great size that holds multiple bottles, food and the cold packs with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but quality is great not too big not too small super hard plastic easy to clean I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper problem
customer_reviews.text: The big zipper gets stuck all the time. Really bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but doesn't keep cool
customer_reviews.text: I love the color scheme and how much it holds. I HATE that it wont keep what ever is inside cold for long. I constantly have to refill with ice, dump the melted water, refill with ice, dump the water within a short time. It's great for a quick venture to the pool but not so great for camping
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Fine for picnics
customer_reviews.text: Rather bulky. Bought it for a larger lunch tote for my teenager. It was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey mom

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean, good insulation, great cooler for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great, it has good insulation, keeps things cool for 24 hours if you use a large ice pack. It is durable, but the zippers are slightly difficult to use for the first week or so. It is very easy to clean, and doesn’t stain easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his lunch box! Lots of room and stays cold!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love again... amazing lunch box for him
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mull

customer_reviews.title: Very durable & well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a field machanic. His stuff stays cold all day. Best lunch box he's ever had. Its well made snd durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheardemon89

customer_reviews.title: Love the color options
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. More than enough room did want to big or small this size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: darryl

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's brand name.
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality. Has plenty of room to hold a complete lunch for two. Can be carried by the handle or shoulder strap which is fully adjustable, can be easily removed, and won't twist by the aid of the rotating hooks. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: LONG RUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box! My husband uses it for work on a construction site. It takes a beating and keeps on going. This is his 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best cooler! My fiancé works outside 12 hours a day, and his frozen water bottles are still ice cold when he comes home. We’ve gone through several coolers and this one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler but the design limits the amount of ice
customer_reviews.text: Because the front of the cooler curves down, that is where the limit of ice can reach or else the ice falls out. The zipper and pulls have become annoying, sometimes they work, most times not.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler/lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband’s second purchase. He uses it for his lunchbox. His first one lasted forever.
customer_reviews.author: SheraK12

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: this thing is very sturdy and has alot of space...i have had it for over a year and its still like new both inside and out
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s big, holds all my meal prep and keeps things cold. Just wish the inner lining was removable. But seems like it’ll hold up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality is amazing and the size it is perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Some manufacturer's offer zip and Velcro as an option for the lid. But I'm getting it use to etc...
customer_reviews.author: adilson amaro

customer_reviews.title: Durable, nice material, & great size
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great size, and extremely durable. The only down side is you can’t easily washed the inside without getting some of the fabric wet.
customer_reviews.author: User1234

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch cooler ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lunchbox, well made. Love that the hard liner is shaped the way that it is, makes for an easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Big Cooler for ADULTS
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is huge. I bought this for my 9yo for school based on some reviews. However, in my opinion, this cooler isn't suited to kids under 17. The zip is diffucult to open also.
customer_reviews.author: Shivonne

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and easy too clean just wish strap belt was a little longer but else then that great product
customer_reviews.author: martita

customer_reviews.title: This cooler holds the temp well. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler holds the temp well. I use it in my patrol car for my lunch and cold drinks. I will always support under armour because of how they have supported us wounded veterans.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my boyfriend, and we both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love the versatility and quality of this cooler. It's sturdy and has ample storage for water bottles, cold packs, snacks ect.
customer_reviews.author: Malori A.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ice last 30 minutes. Thin plastic insert no insulation

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Definitely easy access and holds everything for a long trip

customer_reviews.title: its perfect
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour and Thermos have teamed up to create the perfect size cooler.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Golf Pro

customer_reviews.title: It's not too big!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband on his birthday and he loves it. I thought after seeing it that it was going to be too big but he loves it. He can fit a lot of food in there and a few cold drinks. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife love it because is very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: STI JV

product_meta.title: Under Armour 24 Can Soft Cooler, Sprocket Camo
product_meta.description: Size:24 Can Cooler| Color:Sprocket CamoUnder Armour partnered with Thermos to create premium soft coolers that keep your food fresher, longer. Foam insulation makes sure everything stays nice and cold, and an easy-to-clean, crush-resistant liner holds up to daily wear and tear.
feature_bullets: Constructed with durable, 420D polyester & IsoTec premium foam insulation that helps maintain internal temperature
Flex-A-Guard liner is strong, sturdy, crush-resistant & easy to clean
Exterior zipper pockets for ample storage
Molded rubber handle and adjustable/removeable shoulder strap

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,306 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
